content: स्मृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [स्मृ-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Remembrance; recollection, memory; अ श्वत्थामा करधृतधनुः किं न यातः स्मृतिं ते <ls>Ve. 3. 21</ls>; संस्कारमात्रजन्यं ज्ञानं स्मृतिः <ls>T. S.</ls>; स्मृत्युपस्थितौ इमौ द्वौ श्लोकौ <ls>U. 6</ls>; <ls n="U.">4. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Thinking of, calling to mind. {@--3@} What was delivered by human authors, law, traditional law, the body of traditional or memorial law (civil or religious) (<ab>opp.</ab> श्रुति). {@--4@} A code of laws, law-book. {@--5@} A text of Smṛti, canon, rule of law; इति स्मृतेः. {@--6@} Desire, wish. {@--7@} Understanding.
